public abstract class zeta.form.FormState

(source file: FormState.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.form.FormState
The pure class interface. 
public abstract class FormState
The abstract class of form states, the data model being represented by a form. Each state maintains a set of listeners which are notified if the state is changed.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: FormState.pizza,v 1.2 2000/05/14 17:43:32 wg Exp $

FormState()

addListener(Listener)
Add a state listener.
notifyChange(Object)
Notify all listeners that the state has changed by the given source.
notifyRequired(Object)
Notify all listeners that the state is required by the given source.
removeListener(Listener)
Remove the given state listener.

Listener
The interface of state listener.
ListenerAdaptor
An adaptor for state listeners.

FormState
public FormState();

Add a state listener.

removeListener

public synchronized void removeListener(Listener listener);
Remove the given state listener.

notifyChange

public synchronized void notifyChange(Object source);
Notify all listeners that the state has changed by the given source.

notifyRequired

public synchronized void notifyRequired(Object source);
Notify all listeners that the state is required by the given source.
